mapper.select: select * from article order by a_seq desc limit #{start_article}, #{page_per_article}
mapper.insert: insert into article(a_title, a_detail, a_count, a_dtime, a_filename, a_filepath) values(#{a_title},#{a_detail}, #{a_count}, sysdate(), #{a_filename}, #{a_filepath})
mapper.update: update article set a_title = #{a_title}, a_detail = #{a_detail} where a_seq = #{a_seq}
mapper.select: select * from t_comment where a_seq = #{a_seq} order by c_seq desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_comment(a_seq, c_detail, c_dtime) values (#{a_seq}, #{c_detail}, now())
mapper.update: update article set a_count = a_count + 1 where a_seq = ${a_seq}
